hymn.title: Now to Him Who is able

layout.singingstanza: Now to Him Who is a -- ble, A -- ble to es -- tab -- lish you ac -- cord -- ing to my gos -- pel; The pro -- cla -- ma -- tion of Je -- sus Christ Ac -- cord -- ing to the rev -- e -- la -- tion of the mys -- ter -- y; To the on -- ly wise God through Je -- sus Christ, The on -- ly wise God, To Him be the glo -- ry for -- ev -- er, For -- ev -- er and ev -- er. A -- men. A -- men.

lyrics.stanza: Now to Him Who is able, Able to establish you according to my gospel; The proclamation of Jesus Christ According to the revelation of the mystery; To the only wise God through Jesus Christ, The only wise God, To Him be the glory forever, Forever and ever. Amen. Amen.
